channel.title: CVE Feed for cxong -- tinydir
channel.description: The latest CVEs for cxong -- tinydir

item.title: CVE-2023-49287|2024-08-02T21:53:44.975Z -- cxong -- tinydir
item.description: TinyDir is a lightweight C directory and file reader. Buffer overflows in the `tinydir_file_open()` function. This vulnerability has been patched in version 1.2.6.
